Text:
function EP03_23()
    --.転-5【9月第1週】「変わるモノ・変わらないモノ」
    SaveData.Title = "変わるモノ・変わらないモノ"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    --//BU：アキラ（悲しみ・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[That evening's dinner, Akira was unusually quiet.
その日の夕食は、アキラが珍しく物静かだった。]])

    MSG([[Today's dish was "dipping pasta." Akira's favorite, she prepared a large plate piled with pasta and several small dishes of various dipping sauces.
今日の料理は「つけパスタ」。 大皿に大量のパスタを盛って、小皿に様々なつけ汁を用意するアキラの好物だ。]])

    MSG([[There were three types of dipping sauces.
つけ汁は三種類。]])

    MSG([[A carbonara-style sauce with plenty of fresh cream and cheese, a tomato-based Neapolitan sauce, and a refreshing Japanese-style sauce with shiso and ume shirasu.
生クリームとチーズたっぷりのカルボナーラ風ソースに、トマトベースのナポリタンソース、さっぱりと食べれるシソと梅しらすの和風ソース。]])

    MSG([[Even though Akira had prepared all her favorites, there was no reaction, which made me sad.
アキラが大好きなものばかりで揃えたはずなのに、リアクションがなくて悲しい。]])

    MSG([[Especially the Neapolitan sauce—a confident dish where I lightly simmered and fully flavored it so Akira could enjoy the bell peppers she usually dislikes... but...
特にナポリタンソースはアキラが苦手なピーマンを美味しく食べれるように、軽く煮込んで十分に味つけもした自信作なんだけど……。]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0393.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Sadness・Loungewear "............"
「…………」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0554.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Flustered・Casual wear "Glance... glance..."
「チラッ……チラッ……」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0394.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Sadness・Loungewear "............"
「…………」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0555.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Sadness・Casual wear "Glance... glance..."
「チラッ……チラッ……」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0395.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "Um... It's hard to eat when you keep glancing like that."
「あの……そんなにチラチラ見られてると食べづらいんですけど」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0556.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Flustered・Casual wear "S-sorry. You just seemed a bit off."
「ご、ごめん。何だか様子が変だったから」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0396.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "Nothing's different than usual. The food you make, Mina-chin, is always the best."
「別にいつもと変わらないですよ。ミナちんのご飯も、いつも通り最高です」]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0397.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "Especially this tomato sauce. I can gobble up the bell peppers easily. You're practically the only one who can get me to eat this much bell pepper, Mina-chin."
「特にこのトマスのソース。ピーマンもパクパク食べれていいですね。私にここまでピーマンを食べさせることができるのはミナちんくらいなものですよ」]])

    --//effect：フォント大
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0557.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Smiling・Casual wear "Right, right!? It's delicious, isn't it!?"
「でしょでしょ！？　おいしいでしょ！？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0398.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Flustered・Loungewear "W-whoa, how much enthusiasm is that... Stop, it's surprising. Even the contents of a jack-in-the-box would jump out a little more modestly."
「ど、どんだけ食いつきいいんですか……ビックリするのでやめてください。ビックリ箱の中身だってもう少し控えめに飛びついてきますよ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0558.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Sadness・Casual wear "S-sorry, I was just happy."
「ご、ごめん、嬉しくって」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0399.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Sadness・Loungewear "Ah, no, I'm the one who should apologize for not thanking you for the meal. Even though you always make such wonderful dinners."
「あ、いえ、コチラこそご飯のお礼も言わずにごめんなさい。いつもこんなに素敵な夕食を作ってくれているのに」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0400.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "In these past six months, I've gotten so used to this life, I've even forgotten to say thank you. That's what it means."
「この半年で、お礼を言うのも忘れてしまうくらい、今の生活が当たり前になった。ということですね」]])

    MSG([[Akira said with a deep sense of reflection.
アキラが感慨深そうに言った。]])

    MSG([[Now that I think about it, I have completely grown accustomed to living alone with Akira and maintaining a double life between the girls' and boys' divisions.
言われてみれば、アキラとの二人暮らしにも、女子部と男子部での二重生活にも、もうすっかり慣れてしまっている。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0559.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Normal・Casual wear "I see. It's been almost six months since we enrolled. Time really flies."
「そっか。入学からそろそろ半年になるんだね。時間が経つのは早いなぁ」]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0560.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Normal・Loungewear "That also means the time limit I promised Mom is now less than six months away."
「つまり母さんと約束したタイムリミットまで……あと半年を切ったってことでもあるんだね」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[At the end of next March, we'll have to make a final decision about Marika-nee's future.
来年三月の終わりには、マリカ姉さんの今後について最終的な決断を下すことになる。]])

    MSG([[No matter what, we have to find a lead before then.
何としても、それまでには手がかりを見つけないといけない。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0561.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Normal・Casual wear "If I win the next Princess Election, I plan to take a more active role."
「今度の姫選挙に勝ったら、もっと積極的に動こうと思うんだ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0562.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Serious・Casual wear "If I can beat Uran-san, I should be able to hear more detailed stories about Marika-nee from the upperclassmen."
「ウランさんに勝てれば、先輩たちからももっと詳しくマリカ姉さんの話を聞けるはず」]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0563.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Serious・Casual wear "This time for sure, I’ll get closer to the truth."
「今度こそ、真相に迫ることができるはずなんだ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0401.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "That's right. If I, Erika Ikusa, defeat the current 'Princess' in the Princess Election, my position within the school will become rock-solid."
「そうですね。現役の『姫』を姫選挙でくだしたとなれば、伊草エリカの校内での地位は盤石なモノになるかと思います」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0402.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Sadness・Loungewear "Even if I return to Papa and Mama, I should be able to conduct my investigations without any issues."
「私がパパとママの元に戻っても、きっと問題なく調査を進めることができるでしょう」]])
    --//SE：金属の落ちる音
PLAY_SE("SEb029.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[I accidentally dropped my fork on the table. I didn’t understand what Akira meant.
思わずフォークをテーブルに落としてしまった。
    　アキラの言っている意味がわからない。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0564.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Surprised・Casual wear "What do you mean? Returning to the guys?"
「どういうこと？　おじさんたちの元に戻るって」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0403.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Grinning・Loungewear "...I’m joking. Just hypothetical."
「……冗談ですよ。仮の話です」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0404.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "But Mina-chin has grown enough to handle cross-dressing on her own now."
「まぁでも、もうミナちんは一人で女装を十分にこなせるくらい成長しました」]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0405.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "I shouldn't have to support you or give you cross-dressing training anymore. In fact, I think my presence might be a burden."
「もはや私がサポートしたり、女装のトレーニングを課したりする必要もないはずです。いえ、むしろ私の存在が負担になってると思います」]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0406.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "So after the next Princess Election, I’m thinking I might return to my parents while leaving the house rented to you, Mina-chin."
「ですから、次の姫選挙が終わったらこの家はミナちんに貸したまま、私は親元に戻るのもありかなと思います」]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0407.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "You’d just stay shut in here anyway."
「どうせこのまま暮らしたって、ずっと引きこもりを続けますしね」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0565.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Flustered・Casual wear "N-no way! That’s way too sudden!"
「そ、そんな！　話が急すぎるよ！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0566.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Serious・Loungewear "The reason I’ve been able to keep going until now is because you’ve been by my side… And now you say that!"
「これまでがんばってこれたのは、アキラがそばにいてくれたおかげなのに……そんなこと！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0567.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Sadness・Loungewear "Don’t say things like that."
「そんなこと……言わないでよ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0408.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Surprised・Loungewear "Mina-chin."
「ミナちん」]])

    MSG([[Akira sighed deeply with a look of exasperation.
アキラは呆れた様子で深く嘆息した。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0409.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Smiling・Loungewear "I told you, I’m joking. Mina-chin is totally hopeless without me."
「冗談だって言っているじゃないですか。ミナちんは私がいないとダメダメですからね」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0410.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Grinning・Loungewear "Your kind and cute cousin will always be there for you."
「優しくてキャワイイ従妹の私が、ずっとそばにいてあげますよ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0568.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Sadness・Casual wear "...Really?"
「……本当？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0411.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Smiling・Loungewear "Maybe."
「メイビー」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0569.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Sadness・Casual wear "Please say it clearly."
「ちゃんと肯定してよう」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0412.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Smiling・Loungewear "Well, well. First, we should focus on this month’s Princess Election. Let’s put this conversation aside for now."
「まぁまぁ。まず考えるべきは今月の姫選挙なんですし、この話は一旦置いておきましょうよ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0413.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Sadness・Loungewear "Because, honestly... I want to be by your side, Mina-chin."
「私だって本心では……ミナちんのそばにいたいんですから」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0570.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Surprised・Casual wear "Huh? What did you just say...?"
「え？　今、なんて…」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0414.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Normal・Loungewear "Nothing. Please don’t mind it."
「何でもありません。気にしないでください」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0571.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Surprised・Casual wear "But you said you want to be by my side."
「でも、本心ではボクのそばにいたいって」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//SE：頭を叩く音
PLAY_SE("SEc036.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0415.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Serious・Loungewear "I said! Why won’t you just conveniently ignore that part!? Please learn the basics of romantic comedies!"
「だ・か・ら！　何でそこは都合よく聞き逃してくれないんですか！？
    　ラブコメの王道を学んできてください！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0572.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Sadness・Casual wear "Ouch!"
「きゅう！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0416.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
Serious・Loungewear "Now then, with timing in mind, this is the last cross-dressing training before the next Princess Election. Decide carefully which stats to improve."
「さぁ、ともかく時期的に、次の姫選挙に向けた最後の女装訓練です。どの能力値を上げるか。しっかりと考えて決めてくださいね」]])
    --//選択肢


    -- 　①ビジュアルの訓練
    -- 　②教養の訓練
    -- 　③精神の訓練

    local result = TrainingSelect()

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- 選択肢分岐
    Training(result , "EP03_24")

end
